msg: fulcrum should use the build-torque.xml file from torque

msg: setRequired method needed more logic to handle multivalued fields

author: dlr
msg: Added header documentation to format(String, Locale, String,
Object[]), and added a reasonable default for the Locale parameter
(PCN # 9088).  MessageFormat barfs when formatting Date objects using
a null Locale (but incidently, works fine with String objects).
